name: Freaks & Frankfurters v1.1
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING!!!!

  • This game contains extreme flashing lights and moving layers!!!

Freaks & Frankfurters is a side-view shoot ‘em up game where your goal is to protect the hotdogs on the grill from the enemies that aim to take them.

You control “The Camper” who uses two guns and one power (“Fist Time”) to fend off the hordes of enemies trying to steal the hotdogs.

Freaks & Frankfurters was made for the Supersensory Megamix 21' game jam over 10 days by 4 people

Controls:

  • Move left: A
  • Move right: D
  • Jump: Space
  • Aim: Mouse Cursor
  • Shoot: Left Click
  • “Fist Time”:  Right Click
  • Switch weapons: R
  • Full screen switching: Tab
  • Quit: Esc

Credits:

  • Badinater (Artist)
  • Quincifur C. Jones (Coder)
  • Csaki01 (Coder/FX)
  • CloseWave Music (Marcello Colombo) (Music)
